languages.text: "Многие из них не пожелали подчиниться вашему справедливому решению отправить их на восстановление Сципионы и бежали из трудовых лагерей, свершив святотатство непослушания!"

"Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"
languages.original_text: "Многие из них не пожелали подчиниться вашему справедливому решению отправить их на восстановление Сципионы и бежали из трудовых лагерей, свершив святотатство непослушания!"

traits.locale_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your fair decision of sending them to the restoration site of Scipione and thus they have fled the labour camps, committing the heresy of disobedience!"
"Many of them did not want to obey your fair decision of sending them to the restoration site of Scipione and thus they have fled the labour camps, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

"Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

"Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

"Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

languages.text: “他们之中很多人不愿服从您的合理决定。他们不愿意重建希皮奥内，而是逃离了劳工定居点，还犯下了忤逆的异端罪行！”
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

traits.locale_text: “他们之中很多人不愿服从您的合理决定。他们不愿意重建希皮奥内，而是逃离了劳工定居点，还犯下了忤逆的异端罪行！”

languages.text: «¡Muchos de ellos no quisieron obedecer su más que equitativa decisión de enviarlos al lugar de restauración de Escipión, y por eso han huido de los asentamientos laborales, cometiendo la herejía de la desobediencia!».
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Muchos de ellos no quisieron obedecer su más que equitativa decisión de enviarlos al lugar de restauración de Escipión, y por eso han huido de los asentamientos laborales, cometiendo la herejía de la desobediencia!».

languages.text: 「奴らの多くは、サイピオーネの復元地帯に送るという、あなたの公平を期した決断に従おうとはせず、異端の不服従を犯して労働者居住区から逃亡しています！」
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

traits.locale_text: 「奴らの多くは、サイピオーネの復元地帯に送るという、あなたの公平を期した決断に従おうとはせず、異端の不服従を犯して労働者居住区から逃亡しています！」

languages.text: « Nombre d'entre eux refusaient d'obéir à votre décision, plus qu'équitable pourtant, de les envoyer restaurer le site de Scipione. Ils ont donc fui les sites ouvriers, se livrant ainsi à l'hérésie de désobéissance ! »
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

traits.locale_text: « Nombre d'entre eux refusaient d'obéir à votre décision, plus qu'équitable pourtant, de les envoyer restaurer le site de Scipione. Ils ont donc fui les sites ouvriers, se livrant ainsi à l'hérésie de désobéissance ! »

languages.text: "Viele von ihnen wollten sich nicht an Eure mehr als gerechte Entscheidung halten, sie für den Wiederaufbau von Scipione einzusetzen. Sie sind aus den Arbeitssiedlungen geflohen und haben damit die Ketzerei des Ungehorsams begangen!"
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"

traits.locale_text: "Viele von ihnen wollten sich nicht an Eure mehr als gerechte Entscheidung halten, sie für den Wiederaufbau von Scipione einzusetzen. Sie sind aus den Arbeitssiedlungen geflohen und haben damit die Ketzerei des Ungehorsams begangen!"

languages.text: "Aralarından pek çoğu, onları Scipione'un yeniden yapılanma bölgesine göndermeye dair insaflı kararınıza boyun eğmek istememişti. Bundandır ki işçi yerleşim yerlerinden kaçarak itaatsizlik kâfirliği işlemişler."
languages.original_text: "Many of them did not want to obey your more than equitable decision to send them to the restoration site of Scipione, and thus they have fled the labour settlements, committing the heresy of disobedience!"
